entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hard crash when loading ContentPage with a ContentView in Dynamically loaded DLL #13112
  • [Android]Popup window position not update based on keyboard appearance in .NET 7 #13109
  • VisualState "Pressed" not supported on a "Border" control #13108
  • Padding on ImageButtons works wrong on Android #13101
    Backlog
  • [Android][iOS] CollectionView.CanReorderItems does not work #13100
    Backlog

Closed

  • Button only displays first line of multiline text #9949
    Backlog
  • Button ContentLayout iOS ignores spacing and aligns to edge of button #8467
  • 20x performance hit on Mac #13097
  • Date format DatePicker wrong in Windows #9255
    Backlog
  • BackButtonBehavior IconOverride does not work on Windows #13107
  • Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'You cannot start a load for a destroyed activity' #13105
  • [Bug] MPNowPlayingInfoCenter.default.playbackState not mapped #2429
    Backlog
  • Create code tour of handler architecture #1109
    Backlog
  • HttpClientHandler.ClientCertificates.Add() do nothing on macOS #13102
  • Implementation error in settings manager with .NET MAUI #13085
  • [Bug] Grid doesn't appear to be consistently constraining #2933
    Backlog
  • 'Unable to activate windows store app {id}. The activation request failed with error code "The parameter is incorrect"' #9324
  • Deployment Fails if Maui Class Library is referenced #9564
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MultiWindow on iPad OS (splitview) share same underlying instance #7917

PullRequests

Created

  • Correctly handle ContainerView changes #13114
  • [Proposal] Organize partial classes inside Controls #13113
  • Disable caching when loading images from streams #13111
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Obsolete some of the AutomationProperties #13104
    area/a11y

Merged

  • [build] Disable codeQL test #13110
  • [Windows] Fixes DatePicker format #9924
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Remove Deprecated Application.Properties #13089
    t/breaking 💥

Updated

  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    partner/cat 😻, area/setup 🪄
  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • Update GridExtensions.cs to compatible with Xamarin #9891
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix issue using SVG in SwipeItem Icon #12882
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Close the WebView2 disconnecting the Handler #12925
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix issue rendering Button Background gradient with shadow #13022
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix Html text rendering issue #13078
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix crash with a hidden CarouselView #13083
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove PhoneDialer.Default #13079
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • Fix setting bottom tab icon title #12889
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    area/modal
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
